major: The major scale pairs well with the lydian and mixolydian modes
phrygian: Phrygian is minor in quality, sounding slightly darker than dorian
mixolydian: Mixolydian has a major quality, working well with the blues
minor: The minor scale pairs well with the dorian and phrygian modes
locrian: The locrian mode sounds very dissonant, and is notoriously unpleasing to the ear
